name: Demise Driven
description:
!!! CAN'T BE PLAYED OUTSIDE FULLSCREEN !!!

Demise driven is a little metroidvania game where you play as Constantin Jaquet, king of the realm of Eleyrith and chosen from the gods to by the all powers blade user.

But you are old now, and the gods won't let you reach heaven unless you face a last test, they took all your power and set you back where every things started, in the torturous labyrinth that is the prison of Tlahuanqui where the blade of all powers was first hidden. You will need to die, die multiple time before being able to escape your jail, a proof for the gods that you now accept your death and you can finally reach heaven. 

Controls: 

A and D to move.

SPACE to jump.

!!! SPOIL OF THE ABILITY BELOW !!!

The power of the ability ;

Feather fall : Let you jump from any high place without dying.

Map : Let you see a map at your spawn.

Teleporter : Let you use the teleporter to get to a further place.

Big jump : Let you do a big jump when ALT is pressed.

Lock picking : Let you trough the locked door. 

!!! SPOIL OF HOW TO DIE BELOW !!!

-Fall from a high place

-Get impaled by spikes

-Drown in water after being in it for to long

-Burn in lava

-Get cut by a sword

For people blocked in extreme bloom mode :

YOU CAN'T ESCAPE THE BLOOM GOD
